hero.title: Software Engineer

about.title: Crafting Digital Experiences
about.description: Learn more about my background, skills, and what drives me as a developer

content.paragraph1: I'm a 4th-year Software Engineering student at Haramaya University with a strong passion for creating innovative digital solutions. My journey in tech has led me to explore various domains including frontend development, mobile applications, artificial intelligence, and cybersecurity.
content.paragraph2: Beyond coding, I'm also experienced in canva designer and freelancing, which has taught me valuable skills in client communication, project management, and creative problem-solving. I'm always eager to learn new technologies and take on challenging projects that make a real impact.

experience.title: Professional Experience
experience.description: Freelance canvas designer, collaborative academic projects, and hands-on web & mobile app development with real clients.
